## NgwLayerOptionsAdditional.tileNoData property

Parameter for `TILE` and `IMAGE` adapters to say NGW what will be returned if there is no data to render.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tileNoData?: TileNoData;
```

## Remarks

In NGW api this parameter is written as follows: `nd=204|404|200`<!-- -->, 200 by default. But in frontend libraries default value id 404 (not founded) for performance purpose.

 204
